subject: Boxes
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_450e_1272_16f1
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed

I have the linear sweep board and tuners working, and now making the echo 
box. This makes this stuff look complicated too, and I wish I could avoid 
that. I don't want it to look like exotic technogolgy, it's just radio! This 
is amy first attemp[t at trying th use the stereo outputs of a tuner, I used 
to just mix them together, but every once in awhile I get voices that have 
really weird phase thing, where they sound like they speak in front of the 
speaker, especially on the computer speakers. I'm using only one pick up mic 
mounted opposite, but between the two speakers. I didn't have enough board 
space to add another mic channel with a limiter citrcuit that I like to use.

The micro board is from last spring, I sued one side for th RVG, the ohter 
was all the audio, all I had to do was connect this to a tuner.

Frank
